biography: Born in Omaha, Nebraska, I've lived in Nebraska, South Dakota, Georgia, New York State, and Pennsylvania at various times of my life. I learned to read long before I went to school and began devouring books as soon as that happened. As an effort-induced asthmatic I was often housebound as a kid, so I read more, and began writing my own stories or drawing them (badly) at the age of six or seven. A large amount of my reading was science and nature, from then until young adulthood; these days I read a lot of scientific and technical stuff as part of my work.My love for grand-scale space opera, which ultimately led to the Arenaverse, began when my sixth-grade teacher handed me a battered, cigarette-burned copy of E.E. "Doc" Smith's _Second-Stage Lensmen_, and continued through the rest of Doc's work, the works of Jack Williamson and James Schmitz and Van Vogt and later of Vernor Vinge, Lee and Miller, and Bujold, as well as -- naturally -- through a certain little film called _Star Wars_.Of course, I have a far more general love for science fiction and fantasy in nearly all its forms and I've read literally thousands of books in the genre. I'm also a very long-time roleplaying gamer (since 1977) and I've been an online geek for even longer (first email sent in 1976).Educationally I've gotten degrees in mathematics and science (AS), psychology (BA), and information science (MSIS), yielding a fairly eclectic mix of education from three separate colleges; I've worked as a burger slinger, cashier, bookseller, bank check reviewer, project manager and QA overseer, game design consultant, store shift manager, and now as a research and development coordinator, plus other jobs I'm sure I'm forgetting.I began dating my wife Kathleen in 1990 and married her in 1996, though we'd known each other for a long time before that. We have four wonderful children, one poodle, and a number of chickens, and a large number of stuffed and action figure ponies, dragons, Z-Warriors, ninjas, and others.
name: Ryk E. Spoor

biography: Rakesh is an inventor, engineer, and entrepreneur.Rakesh loves high moral and ethical standards, strong character integrity, fighting for justice, nature, physical activity, endless conversations, being with his kids, being intensely driven, being in love, and fighting for women's rights. Rakesh loves teams with great sportsmanship, good teamwork, being loving and forgiving, God, belief in the human heart's goodness, having faith in people, being empathetic and generous, being a great leader, and being an extraordinary teacher. And Rakesh loves working on technical problems. Rakesh wants to make a remarkable difference in the lives of everyone he meets.Rakesh is a Visionary, Entrepreneurial, Strategic, & Passionate Leader. Rakesh is an exceptional mentor with a tremendous focus on customers, employees, and owners. Rakesh has had a unique privilege to ensure continuous double-digit growth in revenues and profits for the companies he led.Rakesh applies grit, determination, and perseverance, knowing the ultimate success lies squarely on his shoulders. Rakesh values institutional knowledge gained from traditional education programs and believes learned experience is key to applying knowledge. Continuous learning through both drives innovation solves complex problems, effectively constructs high-performing teams, and profoundly exposes all aspects of entrepreneurship.Believing problems are best solved and businesses are most efficiently and effectively run by minimizing complexity, Rakesh applies an 80/20 philosophy in tackling all aspects of life. Simplification allows the most effective utilization of resources to achieve maximum results.  Rakesh intensely engages in developing innovations that he believes will be successful and positively impact society.Rakesh has an MBA from the Old Dominion University, a Masters in Electrical Engineering from the University of Minnesota, and a Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur. Rakesh has several patents and publications to his credit.
